website_summaries.verdict: A little bit of this hypoallergenic, waterproof lip and eye primer goes a long way. Works best with lighter skin types.
pros: Primer helps keep lips smooth, prevents feathering in the lip area, and shows off true lipstick color
Infused with vitamins and essential ingredients
A little goes a long way
cons: Some find it heavy and drying on the lips

customer_reviews.title: Similar formula to Mac paint pot, very decent dupe and I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Lasts all day, my eye makeup doesn't move. The white base helps color show up better on my brown skin. I recommend it and even compared the ingredients to the Mac paint pots and the Urban Decay primer potion and the consistency is identical. Cosmetology student tip: a little goes a long way with this type of formula. Start using a thin coating at first and then apply more to your liking. Works best applied with a sponge tip brush and patted in with your fingers. Eyeshadow primers last longer when set with a little bit of powder. It gives the eyeshadows more to stick to.
customer_reviews.author: N.G.Top Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass next time
customer_reviews.text: I have to jump on the bandwagon with a lot of the comments I see on here. I don't know if I got an OLD batch, or just what, but this stuff is so dry I can hardly spread it onto my eyelids. It cakes up the brush I am using - and I have to dig at it to even get it out. It has absolutely no moisture in it at all. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lip primer for pale skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer for lips, I always use it before applying matte lipstick. It gives you a nice fresh canvas to paint your lips and is great if you want to over draw your lips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Q

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I found this incredibly heavy and drying on my skin. I used a brush to apply it - big mistake. Took long soak in eye make up remover then soap and water to get it off brush. Will not use anything this thick and drying on my eyelids or lips. Actually, won’t put it anywhere on my body.
customer_reviews.author: nme

customer_reviews.title: Settles in crease!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this primer because it was hypoallergenic and the brand I was using before made my eyelids very inflamed and red/itchy. I have only experienced this one time with this brand, which is really good. However, I had to discontinue because it is very oily and throughout the day it settles in the crease of your eyelid, creating a very distinct, gross line of eyeshadow! My former brand never ever did this. Therefore, it does not really do its primary purpose, which is to hold your shadows in place throughout the day. Unhappy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: JayneDoah

customer_reviews.title: True Matte Eye Primer
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin and do not use this for eyes. The trick is to apply eye primer on areas where you are extremely oily (nose and chin). This must be applied with a small brush and only a tiny amount allows you to apply this truly matte product. If you are using for eyes/lips, I suppose it works equally as well there. I was using PhotoReady eye primer but this did not dry matte and was more liquid. I am switching to this for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: SHANY EYE PRIMER IS A MIRACLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE PURCHASED SO MANY SHADOW PRIMERS, SOME OVER $40, AND HAVE NEVER HAD SUCCESS WITH ANY OF THEM. THIS IS A MIRACLE!! A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY; I PUT IT ON, PUT MY SMOKY EYESHADOW OVER IT, LEFT IT ON FOR THREE DAYS AND SLEPT WITH IT ON; IT DIDN'T BUDGE!!! (I WAS HOME WITH A COLD). THIS IS THE BEST EVER AND I WILL TELL ALL MY GIRLFRIENDS ABOUT IT BECAUSE FINDING A PRIMER, WHETHER IT'S $2 OR $50 HAS BEEN IMPOSSIBLE UNTIL SHANY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rosa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect primer for matte lip stain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a primer for my lips. I use matte lip stain and hated how it made my looks look so wrinkled. I love how this primer corrected that. It helps to create a smooth surface. The only thing I do not like is how tiny the jar is. The opening of it is between the size of a dime and penny and it was very difficult for me to get product out with a ton going under my nail. I found that using the pointed end of my Beautyblender was perfect. I also used it as a primer for my eye shadow stick but felt it dulled the color of my eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Natural glow
customer_reviews.text: The color is natural and flattering. I use it on my lid and nothing else. It has a soft rosey pink color to it. If your skin is darker than mine the pink will show more. The container was smaller than I imagined, but I think it will still last a long time. I have photos with just the product on my lid, and hen the final look with eye liner and shadow on the crease of my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Super dry not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited when I saw it was talc and para en free and noncomodogenic but this did not spread AT ALL. I saw the reviews saying a little goes a long but I literally had to press and sort of scoop to get even a little product, and then when I did it actually cracked because it was so dry. I feel like they sent an expired or bad batch so I did consider getting a replacement, but honestly if you’re not gonna get it right the first time and send me a quality product I’d rather just spend my money elsewhere. Might be good for oily skin types but it just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Dry, cakey, light and had sparkles. Definitely not for over 50 people.
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared for the small amount and the tiny pot after reading the reviews. However, when trying to apply I found it dry and cakey...felt like I was tearing my eyelid. Beyond that, it was lighter than my skin color so looked almost light a hightlighter....which might not have been so bad except it had a sparkle effect to it. This might work well for some but at over 50 I'm not looking for anything shiny or that might emphasize the becoming crepey skin around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lurah

customer_reviews.title: MAC PREP + PRIME LIP does a much better job.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well as a lip primer. It left a layer of white stuff on my lips and changed the color of the lipsticks. And, it does not moisturize my lips at all. MAC PREP + PRIME LIP does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your bucks. Hypoallergenic too!
customer_reviews.text: First things first, I am the wife of the account holder in case anyone is wondering why this dude is reviewing the primer. I have sensitive skin and have had an allergic reaction in the past from non-hypoallergenic makeup so I'm very cautious when buying them. This primer works great on my eyelids and lips, the eye shadow does not smudge and this is great for a lip primer! The images are not accurate however, the product is matte and not shiny as pictured but it's not a big deal. As long as it is doing its job and hypoallergenic, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: J&W Beals

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this and use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this and use it daily. Problem is that it is so dry that it is nearly impossible to apply nicely. Forget eyelids. It doesn’t even stick to makeup brush. Wonder if I had an old batch. Sorry; should have returned it, but bottle was so small I barely noticed it. I’ve tried it several times even with some oil. No go.
customer_reviews.author: suzyinNH

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look 20 years older... Not the look I was going for!
customer_reviews.text: Makes me look 20 years older... Not the look I was going for! Very drying, hard to use, hard to get off, has a stickiness to it that is hard even get off the brush as well. Makes my lines and creepiness so much worse. I will stick to my castor oil as a moisturizer even though I have to wait 20 minutes before I put make up on... but it works great just not opaque! This was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ghoops

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is also dried out
customer_reviews.text: I got my replacement order yesterday and the cream was so hard and dry a stiff brush or Qtip couldn’t be used!! I have used this for several years and love the coverage on my birthmark but these last two are in different jars and so dry I can’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: cbare

customer_reviews.title: Chalky and hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. It was hard to get the stuff out of the small container, and hard to go on. It leaves a white residue and was then impossible to get any color on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice product not tested on animals and no parabens
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this eye shadow primer is free of parabens, talc, etc. and not tested on animals. It is also moisturizing which is a plus. The container is very small that it comes in. It makes it a little hard to use your finger to apply especially if you have finger nails. It does do the job of keeping eye shadow from creasing. Overall, I like it and will probably order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nev Dolly

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it!
customer_reviews.text: Do not helps to keep makeup for long! So sad, I read so many reviews and I thought this was going to be a good choice. BUT NOT! I did a fantacy eye makeup and took me so long to finish it because this shany eye prime did not work as others and almost need to start the make up all over again, need to add other eye primer over the old makeup and finish the work. I insted used eye primer from Art Deco 5 stars*!
customer_reviews.author: M. Baron

customer_reviews.title: Worst lip primer ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst lip primer ever! It applies as white and dry that you can't spread it evenly on your lips. They alter the color of your lipstick. Because of the white substance, it turns your lipstick lighter. Worst of all, they don't accept returns. What am I supposed to do with a bad product, give it away which I wouldn't even dare.
customer_reviews.author: Family Music

customer_reviews.title: Covers well, smooth application, but too little product
customer_reviews.text: Product is the perfect color I wanted (evens out irregular skin tones) without being noticeable. Easily spreads in application. The only thing is that there is so very, very little of the product that it hardly seems worthwhile to purchase it. I will be looking into making something similar myself for I have tried Mary Kay (great product, too) & the price points are too high (especially Shany). The ingredients are better than most & that is what attracted me to it.
customer_reviews.author: jjtotheworld

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I've been wanting to get a mac paint pot but wasn't wanting to shell out the $$. Thought I'd give this a try. It's brilliant! Has completely changed my eye game. Any shadows I've used it under have stayed in place all day long. I have fairly dry skin and do moisturize my lids before applying. I then add a powder over it to set before applying any shadow. It is a small jar but fair for the price. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. Nothing like it was advertised. Very dry for undereye application and made the eyes burn and itch.
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I re order this every time I start to run low again which is after 2-3 months of using it basically every day. I use this on my eyelids just about every day as a primer for shadows. Even if I am not going to do shadow I put it on because it evens out the tone and brightens my eyes. Shadow lasts well into the next day (if you forget to take it off at night). I don't use it too much on my lips as it tends to feel drying on my lips but maybe combined with a layer of chapstick it would feel less drying and definitely would make color last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Redgreenblue

customer_reviews.title: Better than MAC Painterly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this first a while ago and thought it was good and liked it fine. Bought the MAC Painterly paint pot yesterday and was surprised to find that the results weren't nearly as good as the Shany primer. While the amount of brighter pigmentation is about the same, I actually had a harder time blending my eyeshadow with MAC Painterly than wth Shany. I actually plan on returning the MAC product and sticking with this instead!
customer_reviews.author: kmbrlymarie

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like this product at first because the container is very small. I have very small fingers and I couldn't get my fingers in the container without getting eyehadow primer stuck under my finger nails. However I still gave it a chance but found that it only lasted half the day. My eyeshadow would crease and get very oily. Still, as a mother with two adorable little boys, I do happen to spend time outside which may be the source of the eyeshadow not lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Mordechai Klein

customer_reviews.title: Best eye primer for this price
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews especially for makeup. But I keep this Shany eye primer/base on subscription order because it is such a good product for the price - even better that it's better for my eyes than most. It has no parabens, or talc. And the coverage is perfect - my eyeshadow never creases when using this as a base. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good and inexpensive eye primer.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eye Primer
customer_reviews.text: After eyelid surgery 3 years ago my eyelids have remained rather unevenly red and blotchy. No other concealer or primer base ever lasted through the day. This product is the bomb! Lasts until you deliberately remove it. Now even when I don't do full eye makeup, I always brush this over my lids with a flat brush to even things out, and it only takes a tiny tiny amount. Can't comment on how it works on lips, as I haven't tried that yet. Don't hesitate on this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Encorebelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Primer and more
customer_reviews.text: I went searching for a new lip primer - after Laura Gellers Lip Spackle was discontinued. This product does the trick! It can be used on lips and eyes. Keeps makeup in place and looking fresh for hours. Helps prevent lipstick "bleed". A little goes a long way. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dove

customer_reviews.title: Cancelled my subscription
customer_reviews.text: Just received this for the first time. I had to find an alternative to my usual eye primer as it had been discontinued and i thought this might be suitable. Opened the large box to find the tiny container. Opened the container to find it looks like half the product is gone and the rest is dried out, not creamy or "spreadable" at all. Could barely get any onto the applicator and what did come was dusty/chalky and not a good primer. Checked the box for an expiration date and funny thing, there isnt one. No lot number either.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed, just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.text: Received this and was excited due to reading reviews, but was disappointed. Not sure if mine was bad, but it is super dry. Cant apply with brush because it leaves streaks in my eyelids. Used my finger but the pod is so small it would get stuck in my nails due to my finger not fitting. Didn't like at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Great shadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: It seems that as soon as I find a good eye shadow primer it is discontinued. I bought this one because I could no longer find my previous go-to and I am very happy with it. I apply it in a thin layer with a highlighter brush. It helps with shadow vibrancy and keeps everything stay put all day long. I do wish it was a tad lighter or had shades to offer so I could use it as my lid color. Hopefully this will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Skin tone specific and dries out
customer_reviews.text: as a base for eye shadow or lip color this will not work if you have deeper skin tones. even when you put the lip color or eye shadow on top it is obvious that you have a white color beneath. moreover, i tried giving it another shot this this week and it is hard and dried out. completely unusable. very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great eye lid primer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I was looking for an inexpensive eyelid primer to help my loose mineral eye shadows stick better. I have not used it on the lips. It does exactly what I want it to. My eye shadow is more vibrant, and it stays all day without creasing (I have hooded & oily eyelids). It looks like you get such a tiny amount but it really goes a long way. I've used this daily for over 3 months and I have a ton left. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me...who knew it would work so well!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this! It stays on me and I work my a$s off, I came home after a 9 hour intense as hell day, and I looked fresh and put together. But this is a teeny tiny pot of primer. a little does go a long way. I'm impressed, and that normally takes a lot. P.S. Prime sent it with my 40lb bag of dog food, floating free in the box. This thing is so tiny We almost missed it in the package. Not cool Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MillerMom 2020

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous coverage. No flaking or creasing, and because it’s cream based it complements my 47 year old crepe eyelids. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't get if you need blendability, otherwise works very well
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on drier than most. Eyeshadow adheres very well, but so instantaneously that there is very little opportunity for blending with a brush. It does keep your eyeshadow on all day, though, and I haven't noticed any eye or skin sensitivity to the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBlissSatsang

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and does not settle in to wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for the first time today. Nice and creamy and did not settle in eyelid wrinkles. I am allergic to almost all eye shadow and with this primer my eye shadow did not bother me today. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary LaBarre

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money product is not what it promised.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and was not able to you it. The product was dried out,stiff and had a off color. I very disappointed in the product. I not purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product was much lighter than what I expected it to be, but after I apply a lipstick or eyeshadow it, you can't even tell it's there. This primer prevented my eyeshadow from creasing and wearing off in the middle of the day, it stayed on all day and it looked exactly like how I first applied it in the morning. I was pleasantly surprised at how well this worked as a lip base, my lipstick lasted for hours on end even after eating. I only had to reapply once vs. reapplying 5-6 times throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: A.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and I typically love it. This time the product was hard instead of creamy. I’ve never had this problem before. Vet unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: The Seven Prides

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: This eye primer has worked great for me, this is my 2nd order although I haven't made it it through the first container yet. A little goes a long way so I think this will last a very long time even though it is a small container. Since I started using this my eye shadow NEVER creases, and will last from morning through to night. I never even knew this was possible, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage, I wish I would have returned it in time (hip surgery and rehab for hip)! It rolls up and balls up. It's like trying to use over dry clay to conceal!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality primer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for. I previously used an eye primer offered by Avon. It became unavailable and for years now I've been looking for a replacement that offered the same results. This product is of a finer quality than what I was using. A tiny amount goes a looong way. I have "mature" skin SO apply this with a very lite touch to avoid the look of crepey skin. I've found it to be a really good primer.
customer_reviews.author: MelKay

customer_reviews.title: I'll Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I can seriously leave on my lipcolor ALL DAY (we're talking 8 AM to 8 PM) with no smudging or bleeding. The lip color I put on top stays on and I don't need to reapply. PROS: You only need A LITTLE TINY BIT. CONS: The jar is shockingly small (I think I could put 7 on my palm), and it's drying if you don't put on vaseline or chapstick first. Also horrible looking if you don't exfoliate your lips first. It will accentuate every crack you have.
customer_reviews.author: Seraph

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for those with oily eye lids/skin!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I have very oily skin and all eye shadows: no matter the price or company would clump in my eyelid after only a couple of hours of wear. This primer really makes a difference, I can get at least 6 hours out of this primer and as long as I dab my eyelids with rice paper mid-day I can get a couple more hours of wear. I give 4 stars because for the price you don't get a lot of product, which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing it , First time was at least 6 months ago so the little tube goes a long ways. This works perfect under makeup.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine3oh3

customer_reviews.title: Nice primer
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smoothly and helps my eye shadow to last all day without creasing. I usually apply my primer with a concealer brush but have found with this product is goes on better if I do use my concealer brush to place the product on my lid but then use my fingertip to apply it. Will definitely purchase this again rather than continuing to use the more pricey department store brands I have been using.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Stremel

customer_reviews.title: it is working better than most products I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time without problems. The base is a bit challenging to get out of the container- fingertip will not work, q tip was OK- so far a small eyeliner brush is working for me. I purchased mainly as a lip base, it is working better than most products I've tried. I tried it as a shadow base and was very pleased with how it worked- all day stay power. I would purchase again, my preference is to keep lip products separate from eye products. The price is very reasonable so it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: work in progress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on reviews. I use as an eye base. It creases on me. My eye lids are oily, so maybe that is why. It does help my eye makeup look more fresh at the end of the day. This product with last a long time even though the container is sample size. I am going to try to use a different eye cream on eye lids or none at all to see if this resolves my issue.
customer_reviews.author: carebear

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice primer. I had been using another product for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice primer. I had been using another product for a few years, and it was causing my eyelids to rash/scale. So far no problems with this product. Goes on smooth and only takes a little. Only complaint is the tub is so small, that it's hard to get out with just your fingertip.... I have to use a Q-tip to dip and apply.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive alternative to my Urban Decay eye shadow primer, this holds amazingly well. I've used it mainly for eye shadow primer, but occasionally as lip primer too. I will apply it once in the morning, covering all around my eyelid/ below my brow area and my eyeshadow and liquid eyeliner last all day with no creasing, oily eyelids, or smudging. For lips, it does change the color slightly since it is pretty bright...but I honestly have no complaints about this product, especially for the price. I would say it stands up to the professional make up brands. In the attached photo, I used it for both my eye shadow and lips. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie

customer_reviews.title: great product, small container
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product as a base under eye shadow. It helps my oily lids hold the color without creasing. The only problem I have is that I usually use a finger to apply such bases, and the container is so small, it is a challenge to fit my finger in. I imagine I will have to dedicate a brush to applying the base, but other than that, it is light and dries quickly as an effective base.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Nice little contain
customer_reviews.text: Nice little contain, easy to use and gentle on skin,but does not consistently battle the problem of oily eyelids and so cannot be relied upon to keep your eyemakeup perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little sticky
customer_reviews.text: It kind of reminds me of that sticky eyeshadow you wore back in seventh grade. It does the job but I'll probably buy something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mai in Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Magic!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was doing before I started using this primer, but I can only imagine it was terrible. Even during the hottest days of summer, my eyeshadow has not budged or creased! And my skin is regularly an oil slick, so this is absolutely the highest of praise. Use quickly with either brush or fingertip, because it sets quickly. Watch your eyeshadow turn heads all day.
customer_reviews.author: DivaTwinMommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent primer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this primer. I have tried many others in the past and this is the best by far. I am not allergic to it (as I am to many eye products), and I like the color and the fact that the product has good "staying power". I sometimes use it as a stand-alone shadow - not just as a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Marthy

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is exactly what I was looking for. My eye makeup stays on all day. I've spent twice as much on other brands that didnt work. This is a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHANY Eye and Lip Primer/Base, Paraben/Talc Free,...
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it is suppose to work. Its a bit pricey though as it is extremely small. The good thing is that you only need a very small amount of it to work, It did in fact work all day, even my 7 year old noticed my eye shadow was on all day because she asked me why did I put on some more-even though I had not done so.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNKS

customer_reviews.title: Showed wrinkles on eyelid when dried ugh...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long. Dried leaving upper lid dry, creepy. Eyeliner, liquid was gone after an hour. Will try again and use less, however jar is tiny and I could hardly get my pinky nail tip to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: really smooth eyeshadow clings on longer lipstick stayed and didn't blead love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great, but ladies beware
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great , but ladies beware, it takes very little to get the job done! This little pot will last at least a year, if not longer. Also, it helps to use a small cosmetic (eye shadow) brush because it's kind of hard to get out with your fingertip, if you have any length to your nails it will get up under them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but works!
customer_reviews.text: Half the size of my Mac eye primer but works just as well. Need a smaller brush to fit in this incredibly tiny container but other than that I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyRoxy

customer_reviews.title: sticky
customer_reviews.text: it's a sticky product, I can't apply in my eyelids, such a thin skin. For the lips, its impossible to spread the product. waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: michelle serra

customer_reviews.title: SHANY Eye Primer works well
customer_reviews.text: Tried for my first time. Like the product, covers nicely, holds my eyeshadow in place. Small container, must use a brush to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup product ever! My face literally eats up make up, and this stuff makes my eyeshadow and lipstick stay in place and the colors go on true and vibrant. Extra bonus is that it works just like Benefit Porefessional on to hide larger pores around the nose and cheeks before foundation. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: S. Werhanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t what I expected. I returned it. Didn’t go on smoothly .
customer_reviews.author: Lipstick Nana

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like how it softens my lips and fills the cracks. Makes the lipsticks look great! Bad things are you must let it dry on ur lips before adding lipstick or else it mixes with the lipstick and makes an odd color. Also the container is very small and u have to use a brush but you have to wash it right away or else the primer hardens onto the brush.
customer_reviews.author: paisley

customer_reviews.title: crap!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up throwing this away. It was dried and useless! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it is a sample size:/
customer_reviews.text: This product was so small I couldn’t even get my finger inside to get any out!! It looks like it should be the sample, not the actual product! The size of this primer is ridiculous.....It is literally about the size of a dime:/ I am definitely not thrilled....It’s a fairly thick heavy product.. I don’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Eggertz

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product, and there is a definite difference between if I use it for my makeup or not. My only complaint would be that it's hard to get it out of the small container once you're formed a dip in the center, but that's just something I can be more careful about.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny

customer_reviews.title: this is the best primer I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: this is the best primer I have ever bought. It makes my eyeshadow stay put. I would highly recommend it. I have not tried it for a lip primer yet.
customer_reviews.author: jan r.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product - I'm not much of a make-up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - I'm not much of a make-up person though. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because it's so tiny that only your finger-tip fits in so if you have a nail (even a slight nail), it's hard to get it onto your fingertip. I guess you could scrape it onto the back of your nail and put it on a fingertip of the other hand. I the color of this primer and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Debra W.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but it is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a cheap primer. It went on kind of thick and does not blend very well. Also it is a very pale nude so it only works on pale skin tones. I would recommend this more for lips than eyes, the fact that it is nude will alter the color of lip stick, and depending on the effect you want, it may be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!! For a long time I used it as my “eyeshadow”. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Only Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help conceal some dark pink skin on my eyelids. Isn't heavy enough to keep the discoloration covered, and my skin swelled a little bit while wearing it. Given, the skin is irritated to begin with. Am switching to a stick concealer, plus a nude matte eyeshadow. Will keep to conceal skin discolorations on other parts of the face.
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Hagee

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. My eye shadow stays on all day with this primer. I have still have to try it as a lip primer with lipstick. It is a small container but a little goes a long way. The primer is lighter than I expected. Not simmer like some of the reviews stated .
customer_reviews.author: G.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Best eye primer I have found yet
customer_reviews.text: Best eye primer I have found yet, lasts all day and throughout the night if needed! I have tried Lancome, Clinique, Estee Lauder and all the other brands I could get my hands on. I will never go back, this stuff is amazing. You only need a little dab and it sticks like concrete. It is a tiny jar but it lasts forever, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Durable weat
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my eyeshadow but I will say that it doesn't match my skin so I have to be careful how I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Delafuente

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Applies easily with little finger, stays put all day. Keeps shadow in place, no creasing or flaking. 5 stars. Little smaller than expected, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: AliCat

customer_reviews.title: It's thick
customer_reviews.text: I have to wet it to go on..not impressed!!! Need a new recipe for this one!
customer_reviews.author: dge

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This primer goes on nice and smooth and a little goes a lot way. It makes a nice base for the more vibrant colored lipsticks and they show up more true than just putting it on over your lips. I wish it lasted a little longer but it still helped my lipstick last much longer than usual
customer_reviews.author: Aqua1623

customer_reviews.title: Great shadow base.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a wedding I worked, and ended up using it on myself nearly every day. I have oily lids and this helps my shadow stay in place. It's not chalky or cakey at all. I've never used it on my lips, so I cannot speak to that. I always use a brush with this 1.for sanitation reasons and 2.because the pot is quite small. There's a lot of product though. A little bit goes a very long way.
customer_reviews.author: Eller

customer_reviews.title: Great primer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer, at a great price! I use it beneath all of my shadows, especially when I have a long day ahead. It didn't work well with Shany brand eyeshadows, but they don't have very good pigmentation to begin with. With my other shadows though, it helps the shadow last all day without creasing and pumps up the real color and helps the shadow stick better.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes colors 'pop'! Does a great job of concealing dark eyelids & shadow stays put for hours! Would recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Nice, does what it should!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this is basically a small jar of concealer but I still really enjoy it. It's great for traveling and I think it helps create a neutral base for my lip color. I haven't tried on eyelids but plan to. I only recommended it if you want a small jar for easy travel like I do. It's about the size of a generic water bottle cap.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I spent too much time trying to spread this one my eye lid. It's wasn't creamy or easy to spread. I tried it twice - both times my eye lid was splotchy and my makeup pilled.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product in an itty bitty jar but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear makeup that often, but when I do this works great. Only drawback is the itty bitty little container. I can barely get my pinky in there for a dab. This is my first order. I got two. I thought one was missing, because it's so small it got sort of lost in the box of Amazon items I had. Found it later.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Madison

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I find the tube too small. I prefer to use a fingertip and have a hard time getting enough primer on my finger. The primer is ok. I’ve definitely had better but it will work for not
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Umm not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: As you can see it is small i even put it next to my portable phone charger and its super small so im hoping that its one of thoes you dont need to use but a very little for it to go a long way buys i shall be back for and update
customer_reviews.author: jamada

customer_reviews.title: Eye Irritation
customer_reviews.text: The first time using this product, I had a burning sensation on my eyelids. I just applied with finger and then it started to burn and made my eyes water. I have to remove it immediately, as it was causing much irritation. Not fun! I see a lot of positive reviews.. So, I don't know what happened here..
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Jolitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Does leave some color behind which is fine to use as a color base. Need a smaller brush to get out of pot.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: This stuff has mega staying power and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews. Really, I never do. After trying many, many natural eye primers, I've finally found the one that actually works! I must have the greasiest eyelids because nothing worked- everything I tried still gave me creased eye shadow after 4 hours. This stuff has mega staying power and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny container, Big results
customer_reviews.text: This product is the greatest $8 eye primer out there. It says for use on lips as well, but I only use it for eyes. It smooths out so easily, and shadows blend perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it does settle in the eye creases after few hours of wear and it’s hard to wipe out. Not quite what I wanted. Like the ingredients though. Works well as a lip primer if your lips are not dry or cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Dry, blobby, hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan, will not be ordering again--on both lips & eyelids it just added a smear of oily mess. :/
customer_reviews.author: idekyo

customer_reviews.title: This one looked fairly similar and had good reviews so I thought I'd give it a shot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because Avon discontinued their primer I had been using for years. This one looked fairly similar and had good reviews so I thought I'd give it a shot. I apply with a brush, and while it does go on smooth and easily, it feels very stiff when it dries. I wasted two eyeliner pencils because of this primer. It is so thick and stiff that the eyeliner doesn't want to move across your lid and just breaks. Not the worst primer I've used, but certainly not the best either.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product but I have extremely sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but I have extremely sensitive eyes. This is hypoallergenic but even some make-up products that are hypoallergenic irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Very, very dry. Use Clinique Touch Base instead (but don't buy it here!!!$$$)
customer_reviews.author: Barb Steffen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT waterproof base for island getaway!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my island vacation...because I’m pale my eyelids have a reddish/roses tint and I want them to be more neutral. GREAT waterproof option. I love that it is paraben Free, too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Parker

product_meta.title: SHANY EYE & LIP Primer/Base - Paraben Free/Talc Free - Waterproof
product_meta.description: Do you know what's annoying, when you create a totally fabulous makeup look that fades within a few hours (or less). Avoid the frustration by using the SHANY eyes and lips primer. This little jar of wonders will make your beloved eye shadows and lip products appear true-to-color and will not crease. More importantly, it lasts all day. You wont have to worry about it fading or melting. Its waterproof formulation is perfect for students, professionals, and performers. The primer blends in perfectly with every skin tone and skin type. This specially formulated primer is Paraben and Talc free has to be part of your beauty routine before applying color to your eyes or lips. The long lasting formula will enhance and show the true color of your favorite lipstick, lip-gloss and eye shadows while preventing any creasing. Your lips will look fuller and smoother all day when you use our primer with any lipstick. It will blend beautifully with the eye shadow of your choice while making it last longer, and prevent your makeup from melting or smudging. Made in USA.
feature_bullets: Primer is Paraben free, Talc free, and Hypoallergenic, which makes it ideal for sensitive skin.
Formulation is infused with nourishing vitamins and essential ingredients.
The long lasting solution prevents your makeup from smudging and fading.
Its duality allows it to work on lips and eyes, while highlighting your natural beauty.
Designed and manufactured in the U.S.A by makeup professionals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
